result.arabic_text: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
result.translation: Na kare Imana Allah, Yarabarongoye bakiri kw’isi kw’ijambo ryiza ryo kuyemera no kuyininahaza, Ibarongora no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa kw’ijambo ryo kuyishimagiza, Yari Yaranabarongoye mu nzira ibereye y’idini ry’ubwislamu ibashikana mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
